alert.note: Alert for City of Fredericksburg; Culpeper; Fairfax; Fauquier; King George; Orange; Prince William; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 2:11AM EST until December 18 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central and northern Virginia, including the following counties, in central Virginia, City of Fredericksburg, King George, Orange and Spotsylvania. In northern Virginia, Culpeper, Fairfax, Fauquier, Prince William and Stafford. * WHEN...Until 545 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 211 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated that an area of very heavy rainfall moved across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain fell in the past several hours. - Rainfall is coming to an end, but many roads remain flooded. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stafford... Dale City... Fredericksburg... King George... Woodbridge... Dahlgren... Quantico... Fairview Beach... Aquia Creek... Potomac Creek... Nanjemoy Creek... Montclair... Triangle... Dumfries... Massaponax... Spotsylvania... Cherry Hill... Independent Hill... Falmouth... Mason Neck... - This includes the following Flood Prone Roads... Sowego Road at Town Run near Route 806, Route 651 near Rock Run, Route 704 near the Spotsylvania County Border, Junction of Highways 3 and 20 in Wilderness, Mine Road and Cameron Street, Route 1 and Potomac Creek, Harrell Road at Claiborne Run, Austin Run Boulevard at Jefferson Davis Highway, Brooke Road and Eskimo Hill Road, Princess Street and Kelly Way, Naomi Road and Jett Drive at Claiborne Run, Catharpin Road at Ni River, Catharpin Road at Po River, Massaponax Church Road at Ni River, Gordon Road at Plank Road, Spotsylvania Co Pkwy at Jefferson Davis Highway, Hams Ford Road at The Matta River, Jackson Trail West at Brock Run, Benchmark Road at Tidewater Trail and Salem Church Road near Jackson Road. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: City of Fredericksburg; Culpeper; Fairfax; Fauquier; King George; Orange; Prince William; Spotsylvania; Stafford
